name: Gregory, Bishop of Nyssa
Dometian, Bishop of Miletene
Marcian, Presbyter and Econome of the Great Church
troparia: (Tone 4) O God of our Fathers,* who always deals with us according to Your everlasting compassion,* take not Your mercy away from us;* but through the prayers of our fathers,* guide our lives along the ways of peace.
kontakia: (Tone 1) Keeping watch with the eye of your soul,* O hierarch, you were revealed as a sleepless shepherd of the world,* and with the sceptre of your wisdom, and your warm leadership* you cast away all the heterodox like wolves* keep your flock unharmed, O all-wise Gregory.
